outputs.output_descr: The underlying objective of this programme is to develop the institutional capacities of the Jordan National Centre for Human Rights (JNCHR) to implement its mandate and responsibilities such as monitoring Jordan's commitment to international treaties, investigating human rights violations, in addition to addressing JNCHR's new responsibilities as chair of the Asia Pacific Forum (APF) of National Human Rights Institutions.

project_descr: Capacity Development Program for the National Center for Human Rights.
project_title: Capacity Development Programme for the NCHR
